sentences: See film on huvitamatu. (This movie is boring.)
Ma kõlasin huvitamatule kooliklassile. (I gave a lecture to an uninterested class.)
Selle lugu oli liiga huvitamatu, et seda jällega lugeda. (The story was too tiresome to read again.)
context: The word 'huvita' is used to describe something that causes a lack of interest or excitement; it can be applied to situations, people, or objects perceived as unengaging.
